input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
The heavyweight champ of our tailored tee shirt lineup, The Organic Cotton Shop Tee is crafted from a burly organic cotton jersey with a subtle ribbed finish for increased stretch and comfort. Built to stand up to the most demanding of days, this one stays on hand all year long and gets better with every wear.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Allbirds Men's Natural Run Tee'
  - Name='ALLBIRDS Soft Merino Tee'
  - Name='Alternative Apparel Men's Crew T-shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown Sojourn Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Outerknown Copper Spotlight Plaid Blanket Shirt'
  - Name='Kotn Women's Luxor Jersey Polo T-Shirt'
  - Name='Kotn Men's Hamatah Sweater'
  - Name='Blanket Shirt - Outerworn'
  - Name='Patagonia Buggy Organic T-Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Home Water Trout Organic T-Shirt'
  - Name='Tentree Men's TreeBlend Classic T-Shirt'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Signature Crew Stripe T-Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Organic Cotton Lightweight Henley'
  - Name='Breaker Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's The Organic Cotton Tee'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Malihini Pataloha Shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown Industrial Men's Outerknown S/S Tee'
  - Name='Outerknown Sojourn Tee'
  - Name='Kotn Men's Classic Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='Kotn Men's Ramzy Knit Shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown The Studio Shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown Tops Womenâ€™s Outerknown Blanket Shirt. Nwt'
  - Name='tentree Men's Embroidered Ten Classic T-Shirt'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Hemp T-Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are men's tees made from natural or organic materials intended for comfort and durability, though Allbirds focuses on running functionality.
Soft Merino wool tee shares comfort and natural fiber aspects but differs in material and likely texture and breathability from organic cotton.
A men's crew neck t-shirt similar in purpose and likely organic or sustainable focus, resembling the Taylor Stitch tee closely.
A men's pocket tee emphasizing sustainability aligns well with the organic cotton tee's function and eco-consciousness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Copper Spotlight Plaid Blanket Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A plaid blanket shirt is a different silhouette and heavier construction than a tee, despite possible fabric overlaps.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kotn Women's Luxor Jersey Polo T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's polo-style jersey shirt differs in silhouette and gender target though shares knit jersey fabric aspect.
A sweater is a different garment category with heavier construction and different use than a tee.
Blanket shirts are different heavier weight shirts with different construction and intended use compared to tees.
Organic t-shirt with outdoor brand emphasis is very similar in function, fabric type, and customer appeal.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Home Water Trout Organic T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another organic cotton tee intended for casual wear, close in features and sustainability focus.
Classic men's t-shirt made from sustainable blend aligns closely with the organic cotton tailored tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Signature Crew Stripe T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's crew neck t-shirt with signature comfort and natural fabrics, similar intended use and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Organic Cotton Lightweight Henley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton shirt similar in fabric and sustainability but different neckline and construction than crew tee.
An organic cotton men's t-shirt similar in material and construction, highly relevant to the reference tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's The Organic Cotton Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical or near identical product from the same brand.
A patterned aloha shirt diverges significantly in silhouette, style, and construction from a tailored tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Industrial Men's Outerknown S/S Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A short sleeve tee from same sustainability-forward brand with similar silhouette and construction.
Close to organic cotton tee with similar fabric focus and style for casual wear.
An oxford shirt differs in heaviness, collar, button front and usage from a crew tee.
A knit shirt is closer to tee than woven shirt but likely heavier and more stylized.
A shirt is different in construction and purpose than a t-shirt, lowering relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Tops Womenâ€™s Outerknown Blanket Shirt. Nwt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A womenâ€™s blanket shirt differs significantly in silhouette, gender, and construction from men's organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: tentree Men's Embroidered Ten Classic T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic sustainable men's t-shirt aligns well with organic cotton shop tee in fabric and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely the same or very similar organic cotton tee from the same brand, identical in function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Hemp T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar organic cotton hemp blend tee with the same brand and similar construction and purpose.
